title: ExamPrep AI
description: An intelligent study assistant designed to help students supercharge their exam preparation.

title: Telegram Gamified Habit Tracker
description: A professional gamified Telegram bot that tracks user experience points (XP), quests, and inventory using Notion as a backend database. Built with Python 3.8+ and modern async practices.

title: Bhopal Weather Analysis Dashboard
description: an interactive web dashboard built to analyze and visualize historical weather data for Bhopal, Madhya Pradesh, India
